Subject: Need to Update Admin Password Used by Stealth Products
Description: We received a request from auditors to update the password of the admin account we use for the stealth products. Can I have documentation of all the places the password needs to be updated? Is there a script I can use to update all the places this password is typically stored?
Solution_Comment__c:
+++++
**Global Settings** 
+++++
Connection Profiles (and User Credentials as needed)
Notification - Mail Server and user name 
Schedule - User Credentials
ServiceNow (if enabled) 
Storage - Authentication

+++++
**NEA Environment** 
+++++
Netwrix Services (Web Server, AIC, Vault) 
FSAA Proxy (if not using LocalSystem) 

+++++
**Activity Monitor** 
+++++
Agent settings 
Monitored Hosts (for NAS devices) 

+++++
**Other Places (less likely to be used)** 
+++++
NAM Agent & MH settings > Inactivity Alert 
Global Settings > ServiceNow 
Individual scheduled tasks 
Job > Properties > AutoRetry

+++++
+++++
